# Biography

Alexander Buritica is PhD student in Department of Economics at the Universidad de los Andes. My research centers on the interaction between agricultural value chains, productivity and technology adoption at both firms and farm producers levels.


You can find my CV <a href="https://alexanderburitica.github.io/cv/ABC_CV.pdf">here</a>.
